reviews.review:
The worst of the HL2 series but still a good game. Started out great but got really annoying, what they did wrong here they fixed in EP 2.
Also, one of my Top 10 games of all time. (Including HL2/EP2)

oyun gerçekten güzel parasına değiyo bilgisayarları düşük olanlara kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.portal gibi cube gibi mantık işi ve ayrıca half life 2 gerektirmio vede bu oyunu indirince 5-6 tane daha oyun geliyor.
хорошее продолжение 2 части но больно короткое 9 монтировок из 10

Se passa logo após os eventos finais de Half-Life 2, sendo portanto uma continuação direta. Gordon e Alyx são resgatados pelos Vortigauns, que de alguma forma parecem ter conseguido tanto salvá-los da explosão do reator quanto da influência do G-Man. 

O jogo trás algumas respostas às duvidas deixadas em jogos anteriores mas também outros novos mistérios, com uma trama bem encaixada e instigante.

Quanto a história, após a explosão do reator, a cidadela sofreu graves avarias e explodirá deixando destruição no raio de quilômetros, de forma que não seria possível escapar em tempo hábil. Desta maneira, a única chance de sobrevivência seria entrar mais a fundo na construção e retardar sua explosão.

Não há praticamente nenhuma novidade no jogo em relação ao HL2, com apenas alguns inimigos novos e uma sutil melhoria gráfica, além de agora contarmos com Alyx nos auxiliando durante quase todas as fases do jogo.

De qualquer forma, apesar de não trazer novidades, esta expansão é praticamente obrigatória para quem jogou o HL2, pois além de complementar a história, mantém o mesmo padrão altíssimo de qualidade do jogo anterior. EXCELENTE (9/10).
It's Half-Life 2, but with less Combine and more Xen.

Velmi slušné pokračování, které tentokrát není tolik o Freemanovi, jako spíš o kooperaci s Alyx (v některých částech hry jí posloužíte jenom jako živá baterka). No, není zase takový problém skákat jak ona píská a když je to možné, házet aspoň GGunem nějaké harampádí na zombíky. Dál v průběhu hry dostanete i staré známé kvéry a vyrojí se na vás dostatek živých i nemrtvých terčů, takže si bohatě zastřílíte.

plusy:
- ještě více Alyx (ale nebojte, občas vás i pustí na kratší samostatnou vycházku)
- kooperativní mód je nastaven tak, aby se vaše parťačka uměla o sebe postarat

mínusy:
- málo prostoru pro GGun++, ta zbraň se mi prostě líbí a ve hře má opět jen jednu ne moc dlouhou epizodu

Этот эпизод (логическое продолжение Half-Life 2) не даёт нам никакой ценной информации о сюжете или происходящих событиях. Нас, больше половины игры, заставляют выбираться из очень странного здания (из плена) и это мне очень сильно надоедало и вызывало рвотные рефлексы от однообразия сюжета. Какая-то логика начинает происходить после примерно 65% прохождения эпизода. Вообще эпизод - неочём!
With HL2, it's always good.

Une suite sympathique à "Half-Life 2" qui dispose, à l'instar de celui-ci, d'une réalisation correcte à tous les niveaux, mais qui se révèle assez courte (3h de jeu) et dont la rejouabilité est faible.

Same solid fun gameplay as HL2... It doesn't answer many questions but does cement Alyx Vance as an awesome character. Extremely short, and a couple levels focus around the gravity gun again, which I didn't care for, but it's still fun and worth playing if you want to extend HL2 by a couple hours.

Still love it..

10/10

Quanto a minha adição para este episódio em específico: ele é essencial assim como o Episode Two, mas ele seria "mais importante" (ainda que o Episode 2 seja o meu favorito), pois ele corrige o furo do final do HL2 normal e coloca um final extremamente phoda.

Overall: 7/10

Arguably the low point of the series, Episode 1 didn't quite deliver on those amazing scripted action sequences that HL2 did. While not a bad entry, it's nothing to get too excited over. Still, the level design and ambience will really immerse you into it. Short, but good enough.

I love how this one starts right off where the last one ended, that was pretty cool. This game, while not as good as HL2, is still pretty kickass. The only thing I didn't like was the long escorting mission, but at least it was easy. Nothing much else to say, pick this game up when you can.
More Half Life. Yes Please.

Great game, picks up where HL² left and continues the story.
It offers about 4 hours of game play if you are good at FPS.

For 3.99 € it's a great deal !

It's alright. It certainly felt like a Half-Life game, but at the same time it just felt a bit lacking. There was practically nothing new added in this expansion, and in turn ended up feeling like a story expansion rather than a gameplay expansion. Practically half of the game felt boring to me, and that's really disappointing considering how the first two games had me in a constant state of wonder and amusement throughout their entire durations. However, the good parts were great; and the final boss, as brief as it was, felt like a throwback to how Half-Life 1's style of boss fights and was enjoyable. 

Only get this if you've played the other Half-Life games. This is not for newcomers as it will leave you feeling like you were missing out on a lot. On the other hand, if you are a fan of Half-Life. chances are you've already played this expansion.
It's good to see Freeman and Alyx tag along together fine in this expansion pack, new enemies and new experiences. Another great Half-Life 2 success!

Игра Half-Life 2:Episode One - продолжение сюжетной линии компьютерной игры Half-Life 2 в жанре шутера от первого лица, разработанное компанией Valve Corporation. Отличный сюжет, там рассказывается ,как вы спаслись чудесным образом от взрыва реактора потом бежали из города, после чего уехали на поезде где вас накрывает волной взрыва. В этом эпизоде вам предстоит бежать из города ,при этом помогать бежать гражданским. Эпичные перестрелки как с зомби, так с военных.
За графику 10/10.
За Game Play 7/10.
За Сюжет 8/10.
Моя общая оценка 8/10.
Короткий,но весьма значимый для Half-life 2 эпизод,показывающий новые элементы вселенной игры.

O jogo começa imediatamente após o fim de HL2. É bem curto, e os primeiros minutos, cerca de 1/3 do jogo, podem ser meio monótonos. Você só fica andando com a Gravity Gun de um lado pro outro, mas após isso voltamos a ação característica de sempre. Agora, Alyx, Gordon e alguns outros sobreviventes estão tentando fugir da City 17 enquanto ainda é tempo. O jogo é uma ponte entre o final fulminante de HL2 e o começo dramático do Episode Two.

Necessário se você terminou Half Life 2.

Half-Life 2: Episode One is the first of the two episodes that take place after the end of Half-Life 2.

After an ending oddly reminiscent of the first game, we are once again left on a cliffhanger after the events of Half-Life 2. This game is the continuation of Half-Life 2, and once again we take control of Gordon Freeman on his unstoppable killing spree.

While Episode One is very short in comparison to Half-Life 2, it still holds the same level of quality in terms of gameplay. The same characters are there, and a few new enemies and mechanics are introduced. None of this is exactly game-changing, yet it does keep it fresh. The story lacks a little, which is mainly due to the lenght of the game.

There isn't much to say for Episode One that hasn't already been said for Half-Life 2. While it is fun to fight alongside Alyx, it doesn't quite make up for the length of it. If purchased through the Orange Box, it isn't much of a problem.
Overall, definitely worth playing, but only as part of the series, and not on its own.
